类的使用
jep.SubInterpreterOptions

使用SubInterpreterOptions的程序包
程序包
说明
jep
 

  • jep中SubInterpreterOptions的使用

    声明为SubInterpreterOptions的jep中的字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    protected SubInterpreterOptions
    JepConfig.subInterpOptions
     
    返回SubInterpreterOptions的jep中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    static SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.isolated()
    Create a new SubInterpreterOptions with the default isolated settings.
    static SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.legacy()
    Create a new SubInterpreterOptions with the default legacy settings.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setAllowDaemonThreads(boolean allowDaemonThreads)
    If this is false then the sub-interpreter’s threading module won’t be able to create daemon threads.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setAllowExec(boolean allowExec)
    If this is false then the runtime will not support replacing the current process via exec (e.g. os.execv()) in any thread where the sub-interpreter is currently active.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setAllowFork(boolean allowFork)
    If this is false then the runtime will not support forking the process in any thread where the sub-interpreter is currently active.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setAllowThreads(boolean allowThreads)
    If this is false then the sub-interpreter’s threading module won’t be able to create threads.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setCheckMultiInterpeExtensions(boolean checkMultiInterpeExtensions)
    If this is false then all extension modules may be imported, including legacy (single-phase init) modules, in any thread where the sub-interpreter is currently active.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setOwnGIL(boolean ownGIL)
    This determines the operation of the GIL for the sub-interpreter.
    SubInterpreterOptions
    SubInterpreterOptions.setUseMainObmalloc(boolean useMainObmalloc)
    If this is false then the sub-interpreter will use its own "object" allocator state.
    参数类型为SubInterpreterOptions的jep中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    JepConfig
    JepConfig.setSubInterpreterOptions(SubInterpreterOptions subInterpOptions)
    Set the configuration options for a sub-interpreter.
